metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4625 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
Integer overflow in the authentication_agent_new_cookie function in PolicyKit (aka polkit) before 0.113 allows local users to gain privileges by creating a large number of connections, which triggers the issuance of a duplicate cookie value.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4625` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-polkit-1.0 - 0.105-11ubuntu1
libpolkit-agent-1-0 - 0.105-11ubuntu1
libpolkit-backend-1-0 - 0.105-11ubuntu1
libpolkit-gobject-1-0 - 0.105-11ubuntu1
policykit-1 - 0.105-11ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: policykit-1 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.105-11ubuntu1').
